titleStmt.title: Reflexions upon a pamphlet intituled, An account of the growth of deism in England together with some considerations about the Christian religion.
titleStmt.author: Willis, Richard, 1664-1734.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Willis by Wing and NUC pre-1956 imprints.
Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
